title: "Could AltSignals become the hottest token in 2023 as experts laud artificial intelligence?"
excerpt: "The robust demand for trading signals has fueled the AltSignals team to consider AI. The company will launch a new platform dubbed ActualizeAI. To become a member, one will need to purchase $ASI, the token powering the platform. The aim is to make AltSignals and ActualizeAI member-governed, with $ASI as the medium of voting."
